actionConfiguration.body:
-- Get order products
SELECT order_line.*, 
       product_variant.sku, 
       product_variant.price, 
       product.image, 
       `order`.total, 
       `order`.taxes, 
       `order`.subtotal, 
       product.name
FROM order_line 
INNER JOIN product_variant ON order_line.product_variant_id = product_variant.id
INNER JOIN `order` ON order_line.order_id = `order`.id
INNER JOIN product ON product_variant.product_id = product.id
WHERE order_id = {{appsmith.store.order.Order_id}};

-- Get order tracking details
SELECT order_track.*, 
       order_status.label 
FROM order_track 
INNER JOIN order_status ON order_track.order_status_id = order_status.id
WHERE order_id = {{appsmith.store.order.Order_id || 1}};
